items.title: Stock markets have a mountain to climb: opt for resilience, growth and value
items.description: Julian Wheeler, partner and US equity specialist, Shard Capital, highlights three US stocks where he would put his money

items.title: The steady rise of stablecoins
items.description: Innovations in cryptocurrency have created stablecoins, a new form of money. Trump is an enthusiastic supporter, but its benefits are not yet clear

items.title: SRT Marine Systems: A leader in marine technology
items.description: SRT Marine Systems is thriving and has a bulging order book, says Dr Michael Tubbs

items.title: Goodwin: A superlative British manufacturer to buy now
items.description: Veteran engineering group Goodwin has created a new profit engine. But following its tremendous run, can investors still afford the shares?

items.title: A change in leadership: Is US stock market exceptionalism over?
items.description: US stocks trailed the rest of the world in 2025. Is this a sign that a long-overdue shift is underway?
